name: core board production | core board | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1825/documentation

The functional unit represent 1 kg of core board, as produced in a modern core board mill. A coreboard is a core made from board which is used as packaging material for paper sold on rolls. Coreboards are made from recycled pulp which is assumed to be produced on-site without addition of any chemicals. The waste paper used for the recycling process is mainly ;corrugated carboard and household waste paper. Additionally, starch and semi-chemical pulp are used to improve strength of the coreboard. It is assumed that the semi-chemical pulp is produced on-site out of birch wood chips without the addition of any bleaching chemicals. ;;The main sources for the dataset are the Corporate Environmental Reports from a Finnish coreboard producer (Corenso (2000) and Corenso (2001)).;;References: ;Corenso (2000) Environmental Statement 1999 Pori Coreboard Mill. Corenso United Oy Ltd, Pori (Finland) as pdf-File under: ;http://www.storaenso.com/CDAvgn/main/0,,1_-2393-2097-,00.html;;Corenso (2001) EMAS Environmental Statement Update for the Year 2000 Pori Coreboard Mill. Corenso United Oy Ltd, Pori (Finland) as pdf-File under: http://www.storaenso.com/CDAvgn/main/0,,1_-2393-2097-,00.html

This activity starts with the reception of the raw materials, such as waste paper, starch and pulpwood.

The dataset includes material input, water (cooling & process) consumption, energy consumption, emissions to air and water. Estimations for infrastructure. No waste reported.
category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data represent the average technology in the late 1990ies and early 2000s.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data based on one Finnish plant from Corenso Ltd. Representing here average European data.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Data based on the state-of-the-art technology in Finnland in the 2000s.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Based on literature (see dataset field “Published Source”)
